modShortDescription: We got the mod together with a lot of approval from other modders also added many own mods. Let yourself be surprised the mod is loved by many.
modDescription:
We got the mod together with a lot of approval from other modders also added many own mods. Many thanks, of course, to the modders for theirs Job.

The mod is about survival, we have collaborated with Lichti. Own workbenches and a small [farming](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-farming/) facility built in. Who loves to breed animals or to try something new is right here.

Let yourself be surprised the mod is loved by many. Vanilla will be boring for a long time with this mod you will experience new ones. You can use the supplied map in another world. Diving the world.

**Thank you very much for your support and approval:**

* ShoudenKalferas
* Bdubyah
* JaxTeller718
* Guppycur

Please note if you want to run your own server, you should load the server files. For the single player only the client.

**[Download](https://dev.azure.com/joshferrell/ZombieDayz/_git/ZombieDayz)** Client Files  
**[Download](https://dev.azure.com/joshferrell/ZombieDayz%20Server/_git/ZombieDayz%20Server)** Server Files

If you appreciate Sechsterversuch’s work and you want to show support, use this [donate link](https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/7daysserver584).

If you need help, you can use this [support link](https://discord.gg/eQMWEtj).

**Credits:** [Sechsterversuch](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/sechsterversuch/)
